---
title: "Background Resources"
---

New to proteomics? No problem! We have assembled a list of good resources for learning about
mass-spectrometry based proteomics quickly, from videos to articles to short courses.
Just pick the format you like best.

## General Proteomics
These external links provide some resources to get up to speed on mass spectrometry-based proteomics fast




## Glycoproteomics
These links provide some resources to get up to speed on mass spectrometry-based glycoproteomics fast

**Books**<br>
📒 NCBI Bookshelf - [Essentials of Glycobiology][essentials_book]<br>

**Short Introductory articles**<br>
📄 “[The Hitchhiker's guide to glycoproteomics][hitchhikers_guide]” (2021) Oliveira * Kolarich<br>
📄 “[Glycoproteomics Nature Primer][nature_primer]” (2022)<br>
📄 “[Glycomic and glycoproteomic analysis of glycoproteins-a tutorial][glyco_tutorial]” (2017) Shajahan*Azadi<br>
📄 “[Critical considerations in N-glycoproteomics][critical_considerations]” (2023)<br>

Videos (webinars, lectures): 
📄 “[GlySpace Education][video_glyspace]”
📄 “[SIB YouTube Channel (for glyco)][sib_youtube]”
📄 “[GlySpace webinar series][glyspace_webinars]”
📄 “[Translational clinical glycoproteomics in practice | Bruker][bruker_in_practice]”
📄 “[Gordan Lauc’s YouTube Glyco-education channel][lauc_youtube]”
